original_text: And Asahel pursued after Abner; and in going he turned not to the right hand nor to the left from following Abner.
korean_text: 아사헬이 아브넬을 쫓아 달려가되 좌우로 치우치지 않고 아브넬의 뒤를 쫓으니

sentences.original_text: and in going he turned not to the right hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가는 동안 그는 오른쪽으로 돌지 않았고

sentences.original_text: nor to the left from following Abner
